page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE - R.STROUD
page.content:
My name is Richard Stroud. I am ten years old and I am a pupil at Mayfield Junior School in Farnborough Hampshire. I have written about{a day {in my life at school and at home.
On a Friday I get up at 7.00 then I get dressed.At 7.30 I have my breakfast.At 8.00 I get ready for school.At 8.30 I get in the car to go to school.Then the bell rings.After the bell has rung we walk into school.Then we take our coats off.At 9.00 we have assembly.At about 9.30 we walk back to our classrooms.When we get back to the classroom we do our handwriting.After we have done our handwriting we do some Maths. At 10.30 we have playtime. At 10.45 we come in and do our English. At 12.00 we have our lunch. After our lunch we have a playtime.
